# Data Mining MCP Server Project

This is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Data Mining course materials.

## Project Structure
- Lectures: week 1-13
- Tutorials: week 1-13  
- Tutorial Answers: week 1-13
- Past Papers: 2015-2024
- Additional Resources

## Development Progress
- [x] Create .github directory and copilot-instructions.md
- [x] Get MCP server project setup information
- [x] Create folder structure for course materials
- [x] Create MCP server TypeScript files
- [x] Create package.json and configuration files
- [x] Create README.md with instructions
- [x] Install dependencies and compile

## âœ… Project Complete!

The Data Mining MCP Server is now ready to use. All course material folders have been created and the server has been successfully built.

### What's Available

**Tools:**
- get-course-overview
- get-week-materials
- list-past-papers
- get-year-papers
- search-materials

**Course Structure:**
- 13 weeks of lectures, tutorials, and answers (week-1 through week-13)
- Past papers from 2015-2024
- Additional resources folder

### Next Steps

1. **Add Your Content**: Place your course materials in the `course-materials/` folders
2. **Connect to Claude**: Follow the instructions in QUICKSTART.md
3. **Start Using**: Ask Claude about your Data Mining course materials!

See README.md for detailed documentation and QUICKSTART.md for a 5-minute setup guide.
